attributes.action: stop Omniport Holdings Ltd from imposing Airport exit fee's at Norwich Airport
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Norwich International Airport
     Airport Development Fee (TAX)

All Airport fee's should be included in the Airline landing charges.
Norwich Airport Should not be able to stop passengers from boarding flights
which have been paid for with this extra fee.Omniport Holdings Ltd fee scheme has no end in sight or price cap.Only local or govenment bodies should have the right to impede access to ports.
